mapper.select: SELECT g.gameid, u.nick, g.gamename, g.gameprofile FROM games g LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userid = u.userid WHERE g.isopen = 'Y' ORDER BY g.gameid DESC
SELECT u.userid, u.nick, g.gamename, g.gamecontent, g.gameprofile, g.isopen FROM games g LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userid = u.userid WHERE g.gameid = #{gameid}
SELECT u.nick, c.gcomment, c.point, TO_CHAR(c.writedate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS writedate FROM game_comment c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.userid = u.userid WHERE c.gameid = #{gameid} ORDER BY writedate
mapper.update: UPDATE games SET gamename = #{gamename}, gamecontent = #{gamecontent} WHERE gameid = #{gameid}
UPDATE games SET isopen = #{isopen}, opendate = SYSDATE WHERE gameid = #{gameid}
mapper.select: SELECT g.gameid, g.gamename, g.gamecontent, p.point FROM games g LEFT JOIN (SELECT gameid, AVG(point) AS point FROM game_comment GROUP BY gameid) p ON g.gameid = p.gameid WHERE g.isopen = 'Y' ORDER BY p.point
SELECT gameid, gamename, gamecontent, opendate FROM games WHERE isopen = 'Y' ORDER BY opendate DESC
SELECT g.gamename, g.gamecontent, g.gameid, u.nodeid, u.lastdate FROM user_gameplay u LEFT JOIN games g ON g.gameid = u.gameid WHERE u.userid = #{userid} ORDER BY u.lastdate
SELECT * FROM games WHERE userid = #{userid} ORDER BY opendate, gamename
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO games( gameid, userid, gamename, gamecontent ) VALUES( seq_gameid.nextval, #{userid}, 'Default Title', 'Default Account' )
INSERT INTO game_node( gameid, nodeid, nodename ) VALUES( #{gameid}, seq_nodeid.nextval, 'SceneName' )
mapper.select: SELECT g.gameid, u.userid, u.nick, g.gamename, g.gamecontent, g.gameprofile, g.isopen FROM games g LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userid = u.userid WHERE u.userid = #{userid} AND g.gamename = 'Default Title' AND g.gamecontent = 'Default Account'
SELECT g.gameid, u.nick, g.gamename, g.gamecontent FROM games g, users u WHERE g.userid = u.userid AND g.gamename LIKE '%${value}%' AND g.isopen = 'Y'
SELECT CNT(*) FROM games g, users u WHERE g.userid = u.userid AND g.gamename LIKE '%${value}%' AND g.isopen = 'Y'
